channel.title: [pi] Edit Music Tab [pi]
channel.description: Does any1 have any idea how i would do this, I'm planning on making a 'support section' for players.

item.title: [pi] Edit Music Tab [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

The ones you want are these

6294 = Music + Sounds are only
963 = Music

6300 = To reduce memory requirements
6301 = music & sounds are only
6302 = available in the high-detail
6303 = If you wish to hear these
6304 = please switch versions, but
6305 = bear in mind things will run
6306 = more slowly as a result.
6307 = version of the game.

(they are all the music relevant ones I found anyway).
Taken straight out of a list in the download link in my signature. Download it, there might be some more things you find useful.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Edit Music Tab [pi]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

how do i find out the line ids?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Edit Music Tab [pi]
item.dc:creator: @MrMud MrMud
item.description:
@MrMud wrote:

every line of text has a Id, if you know the id you can do something like:

sendQuest("bank", 1);

bank is the text you’ll see, 1 is the ‘line’ Id

Read full topic
